info.headline: Flood Warning issued June 5 at 2:52PM EDT until June 8 at 2:00AM EDT by NWS Indianapolis IN
info.description:
...The National Weather Service in Indianapolis IN has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Indiana...
White River at Elliston.
White River at Edwardsport.
White River at Newberry.
Wabash River at Lafayette.
.Rainfall amounts of 2 to 4 inches across west-central Indiana will produce minor flooding along portions of the Wabash and White rivers. River flooding should begin Friday.
* WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast.
* WHERE...White River at Newberry.
* WHEN...From Friday afternoon to early Sunday morning.
* IMPACTS...At 13.5 feet, High water may affect CR 550 S in the Mary Long Cutoff area.
* ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1:30 PM EDT Thursday the stage was 8.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage tomorrow afternoon to a crest of 13.6 feet early Saturday morning. It will then fall below flood stage early Saturday afternoon. - Flood stage is 13.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction:
Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas.
Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/ind.
The next statement should be issued Friday morning by around 600 AM EDT /500 AM CDT/.

parameter.value: FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM FRIDAY AFTERNOON TO EARLY SUNDAY MORNING

area.areaDesc: Daviess, IN; Greene, IN; Knox, IN
